options.label: B

questions.text: Which directive is used to include external HTML templates in an AngularJS application?
What does two-way data binding mean in AngularJS?

options.label: A
options.text: Data can only flow from the controller to the view.

options.label: B
options.text: Data can only flow from the view to the controller.

options.label: C
options.text: Changes in the model are automatically reflected in the view, and vice versa.

options.label: D
options.text: Data can only be bound to a single variable.

questions.text: What is the purpose of the ng-app directive in AngularJS?

options.label: A
options.text: It defines the application's routing configuration.

options.label: C
options.text: It bootstraps the AngularJS application to the HTML document.
